Welcome to Our Newly Re-designed Website

After months of developing and designing, our new Website is finally up and running!

I am proud to welcome you to our newly redesigned website, www.nra.gov.sl, which is a significant step in reinforcing our communications machinery and ensuring efficient and effective dissemination of information pertaining to the Authority’s services and processes. Through this website, we will strengthen Taxpayers engagement and increase voluntary compliance.

The site has been redeveloped to provide a more effective and user-friendly communications experience. Unlike the previous version, it has a clean and modern look with enhanced functionality and accessibility.

We have taken great care to improve navigation and search capabilities in a quest to increase usability of the site. Work on this site is in progress as information is still being uploaded.  We will continue to work assiduously in updating this information to keep you abreast of our services and activities.

Site visitors whether individuals, businesses or otherwise will be able to report their concerns directly to our Corporate Services Department.  They will also be able to intimately interact with us via Face book, Twitter and YouTube (NRA sierra Leone)!

We look forward to receiving feedback on the new site to help us improve our services and hope your overall experience with us is a great and enjoyable one.

 

Haja Kallah-Kamara

Commissioner-General

 

 

 

Important Dates

Installed payment for Corporate Income tax and Trade/Profit tax should be paid:

1st Quarterly Installment: 15th of the third month (e.g. 15th March)
2nd Quarterly Installment: 15th of the sixth month (e.g. 15 June)
3rd Quarterly Installment: 15th of the ninth month (e.g. 15 September)
4th Quarterly Installment: 15th of the twelfth month (e.g. 15 December)
5th Quarterly Installment: 120 days after the end of your accounting year (e.g. 30th April)
